extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of federal, state, local, tribal, territorial governments, or the private sector?

extracted_playbook.title: Review Configuration Changes
extracted_playbook.description: System owners and administrators should review any configuration changes prior to implementation to avoid unwanted impacts.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Malware-Associated Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Block email attachments commonly associated with malware (e.g., .dll and .exe).

extracted_playbook.title: Block Unscannable Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Block email attachments that cannot be scanned by antivirus software (e.g., .zip files).

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Group Policy Object and Firewall Rules
extracted_playbook.description: Implement Group Policy Object and firewall rules to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Antivirus Program and Patch Management
extracted_playbook.description: Implement an antivirus program and a formalized patch management process.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Email Gateway Filters
extracted_playbook.description: Implement filters at the email gateway to block suspicious emails.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Suspicious IP Addresses
extracted_playbook.description: Block suspicious IP addresses at the firewall.

extracted_playbook.title: Adhere to Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that users have the minimum level of access necessary to perform their duties.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement DMARC Validation System
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a Domain-Based Message Authentication, Reporting & Conformance validation system.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment and Segregate Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment and segregate networks and functions to limit the spread of malware.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Lateral Communications
extracted_playbook.description: Limit unnecessary lateral communications within the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable File and Printer Sharing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable file and printer sharing services. If these services are required, use strong passwords or Active Directory authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce multi-factor authentication for accessing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when opening email attachments, even if the attachment is expected and the sender appears to be known.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Firewall on Workstations
extracted_playbook.description: Enable a firewall on agency workstations, configured to deny unsolicited connection requests.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unnecessary Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unnecessary services on agency workstations and servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan and Remove Suspicious Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Scan for and remove suspicious email attachments; ensure the scanned attachment is its 'true file type' (i.e., the extension matches the file header).

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Web Browsing Habits
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor users' web browsing habits; restrict access to suspicious or risky sites.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Removable Media
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when using removable media (e.g., USB thumb drives, external drives, CDs).

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Downloaded Software
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all software downloaded from the internet prior to executing.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Situational Awareness
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain situational awareness of the latest threats and implement appropriate access control lists.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Additional Resources
extracted_playbook.description: Visit the MITRE ATT&CK Techniques pages, CISAâ€™s Alert on Technical Approaches to Uncovering and Remediating Malicious Activity, and the joint CISA and MS-ISAC Ransomware Guide for more information on addressing potential incidents and applying best practice incident response procedures.
